tool_description: Calculates comprehensive quality scores for reviews based on multiple factors including helpfulness, detail, authenticity, and readability.

review_texts.description: Array of review text content for quality assessment

sentiment_scores.description: Array of sentiment scores from sentiment analysis

review_lengths.description: Array of review text lengths in characters

helpfulness_votes.description: Array of helpfulness vote counts from users

scoring_weights.description: Weights for quality factors: [detail, authenticity, sentiment, helpfulness, readability]

error_messages: Array length mismatch: review_texts and sentiment_scores must have the same length. Verify data alignment from previous processing steps.
Invalid scoring_weights: Must provide exactly 5 weights that sum to 1.0. Weights represent [detail, authenticity, sentiment, helpfulness, readability].
Quality threshold out of range: Value must be between 0.1 and 1.0. Higher thresholds filter for higher quality reviews.
Optional array length mismatch: If provided, spam_probabilities, review_lengths, and helpfulness_votes must match main arrays length.
Processing limit exceeded: Maximum 1500 reviews per batch. Split large datasets for better memory management.
usage: Provide review_texts and sentiment_scores arrays. Optionally include additional quality factors and configure scoring weights. The tool calculates comprehensive quality scores.

quality_scores.description: Overall quality scores for each review (0-1 scale)

quality_categories.description: Quality categories: excellent, good, fair, poor

detail_scores.description: Detail and informativeness scores for each review

readability_scores.description: Readability and clarity scores for each review

high_quality_count.description: Number of reviews exceeding quality threshold

average_quality_score.description: Average quality score across all reviewed items
